         Semester Gasal 2025/2026</h3>"

---

```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(htmltools)
soalku <- readRDS("soal_ujian_pertama.rds")
jawabanku <- fbaca_jawaban(username())
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
HTML(paste0("<h5 style='color:brown;'>Soal-", 1:length(soalku),"</h5>", soalku, 
"<br><h5 style='color:brown;'>Jawaban:</h5><h5 style='color:blue;'><i>", jawabanku, "</i></h5><br>"))
```
